bibl.author: Earl Russell
bibl.title: Earl Russell to Mr. Adams, 8 August 1864
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839-1919, Library of Congress, Washington, DC

body.head: Earl Russell to Mr. Adams
body.p: With reference to my letter of the 28th ultimo, I have the honor to state to you that her Majesty's Government do not see any sufficient grounds for coming to the conclusion, upon the statements contained in your letter of the 27th ultimo, that the steamer Georgia is about to be again used for belligerent purposes. With a view
